name: Hyginja: A Tale of Smells
description:
This is a game stemming from having to endure the stench from random people in closed, cramped spaces. An ordinary every day man can no longer take the horrors from such a people, and thus chooses to become the Hyginja. He fights to rid the world of unpleasant smells!

Everything Hand Drawn

Everything not perfectly coded, but coded by one man.
